SampleMetadata.Brief: Controlling a humanoid character through physics; Driving animations using the AnimationController component; Manual control of a bone scene node; Implementing 1st and 3rd person cameras, using raycasts to avoid the 3rd person camera clipping into scenery; Defining attributes of a custom component so that it can be saved and loaded; Using touch inputs/gyroscope for iOS/Android (implemented through an external file).
